extension_description.message: Read aloud the current web-page article with one click; a text-to-speech voice extension that actually works. English and Vietnamese

options_rate_explain.message: .5 is half speed, 2 is double speed.

options_spchlet_explain.message: If reading sometimes stops abruptly in the middle of a long sentence, try reducing this number. This setting causes longer paragraphs to be broken up into smaller speechlets.
